title: Leaverbuster
body: League messed up it's own patch and wouldn't let me go ingame so I got a leaverbuster which feels amazing.

replies.body: Typically when something goes wrong with one of the patches, the usual culprit tends to be a hiccup in your connection while downloading the patch which can cause some corrupted or completely missing patch files. I'd let that repair/repatch finish up if it's already started, or go ahead and start a repatch by grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and turning the *force repatch* option on. It might be a good idea to look over the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is in order there so that you don't have the same troubles again!
Nah I'm already on the last match of leaverbuster. it's pretty easy once you find a game you can play for 20 minutes at a time like overwatch or battlerite.
